tests.title: should work

match __, null
tests.code: expect(match(__, null)).to.be.true

tests.title: match null, null
tests.code: expect(match(null, null)).to.be.true

tests.title: match null, 'hello'
tests.code: expect(match(null, 'hello')).to.be.false

tests.title: match 'hello', 'hello'
tests.code: expect(match('hello', 'hello')).to.be.true

tests.title: match 'hello', 'goodbye'
tests.code: expect(match('hello', 'goodbye')).to.be.false

tests.title: match ((x) -> x == 10), 10
tests.code: expect(match((x => x === 10), 10)).to.be.true

tests.title: match ((x) -> x == 10), 20
tests.code: expect(match((x => x === 10), 20)).to.be.false

tests.title: match ((x) -> x > 10), 20
tests.code: expect(match((x => x > 10), 20)).to.be.true

tests.title: match(re, 'test.js')
tests.code: expect(match(re, 'test.js')).to.be.true

tests.title: match(re, 'test.txt')
tests.code: expect(match(re, 'test.txt')).to.be.false

tests.title: match($('x'), 10)
tests.code:
//$$._ match($('x'), 10)
  expect(match($('x'), 10)).to.have.property('$x', 10)

tests.title: believe_(_Bob, _likes, _Fish).match Believe, __, _likes, __
tests.code: expect(believe_(_Bob, _likes, _Fish).match(Believe, __, _likes, __)).to.be.true

tests.title: believe_(_Bob, _likes, _Fish).match Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')
assert_(Believe, _Bob, _likes, _Fish).match Assert, Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')
onAssert(Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')).match assert_(Believe, _Bob, _likes, _Fish)
onAssert(Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')).match attempt_(Believe, _Bob, _likes, _Fish)
tests.code:
const result = onAssert(Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')).match(attempt_(Believe, _Bob, _likes, _Fish));
return expect(result).to.be.false;

tests.title: onAssert(Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')).match assert_(Believe, _Bob, _likes, _Fish)
tests.fullTitle: Matching Triggers with Xtras onAssert(Believe, $('x'), _likes, $('y')).match assert_(Believe, _Bob, _likes, _Fish)
